name: Project Owner Template
description: Monitor a GitHub project's health: deployments, PRs, commits, issues, and blockers

schedule.rationale: Daily check-ins provide consistent visibility without overwhelming noise

payload.message:
Review PROJECT_NAME status using `gh` CLI.

Run: gh repo view GITHUB_OWNER/REPO_NAME --json name,description,updatedAt,defaultBranchRef
Run: gh pr list --repo GITHUB_OWNER/REPO_NAME --state open --limit 5
Run: gh issue list --repo GITHUB_OWNER/REPO_NAME --state open --limit 5

Your ENTIRE response must be under 400 characters. Be extremely concise.

Example:

DO NOT exceed 400 chars total.

configuration.schedule: Adjust everyMs for different check-in frequency (43200000 = 12h, 86400000 = 24h)
configuration.delivery: Change 'channel' to your preferred platform (discord, slack, etc.)
configuration.char_limit: The 400 char limit prevents overwhelming messages. Increase if needed.
configuration.gh_cli: Requires GitHub CLI (gh) installed and authenticated

recommendedFor: Teams wanting automated project health checks
usagePattern: Clone this job for each project you want to monitor. Rename each with the project name.

customizations.comment: Daily check-ins for blog content and site health
